title: rAjayOga abhinayam lAvaNyam
sahitya:
rAjayOga abhinayam lAvaNyam gOvinda naTana


anupallavi

  navarasamenum bhAvAlankAram shrngAram abhinayamenum gambhIram oyyAram


caraNam    kOshadaLa nALa kOlam kuncita puruva jAlam prakAsha nayanA dhArALam 
kAmAtishaya kamanIAtishaya niradhishaya vijaya kallOla aullOla kalOla karNA ruNAkaraNam enum
					(madhyamakAla)
nANa madanAdi mukha kalaiyE nava nava mighumenum madhupamenum isaiyAl arubadavaL 
adilumighudi ena tagha manadu murai paDavum matimukhamenum rIti nidhiyE mAmalarenum 
pAdumadaLa kalaigaLum paraviDa surataru ena tigazhum allavO iduvedumbum nigharillaiyE
